GeneDef.label: Thermal Nullifier
GeneDef.description: Carriers with this gene find themselves comfortable only at 0 degrees. Their only hope is some sort of offsetts

GeneDef.label: Thermal Inversion (minor)
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are somehow inverted, finding cold wether too warm, and warm wether too cold. There is no known easy fix. luckilly, the amount is "manageable", with work. There is no soloution known

GeneDef.label: Thermal Inversion
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are somehow inverted, finding cold wether too warm, and warm wether too cold. There is no simple soloution known

GeneDef.label: Hyper Thermal Inversion
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are somehow inverted and amplified, finding snowflakes burning hot, and a warm day a freezer. They are, effectivly, doomed from birth, short of replaceing most biological parts.
